overview:
Jerry Lepore is a 30 year veteran of the software industry, having worked with a number of top-tier technology companies as well as startups in a variety of executive level technology and operational positions. He has raised over $750M in capital to fund new companies and ventures.

From 2006 to 2008, Mr. Lepore was the Chief Operating Officer at Benefitfocus.com, Inc., the leader in software and services for the healthcare benefits market providing “Quote to Claim” technology for both enterprise and consumer applications.

Mr. Lepore has also served as the Chief Operating Officer for Cardean Learning Group, an online learning institute, and ProAct Technologies, a software company targeted at delivering solutions in the Employee Resource Management (ERM) and Benefits Management domain.

In the late 1990’s, Mr. Lepore was the Founder and Managing Director at Pinkerton Scientific (PSCI) a new division of Pinkerton Computer Consultants Inc. PSCI delivered professional products and strategic business and technology services to executives in the Financial Services, Insurance and HealthCare Industries.
